TopicTitle: How do i apply for being a mod?

Articles.Content:
i want to be a mod but i dont know how, and i might be able to do some good

@Vanamonde(i hope i am allowed to ping you), can you tell me how? you are a lead mod and seem really cool

Edited April 13, 2023 by Dunas Only Moon

48 minutes ago, Dunas Only Moon said:

i want to be a mod but i dont know how, and i might be able to do some good

Thank you for the interest! 

We recruit, from time to time, when we need to expand the team or replace someone who's moved on.  Typically what we do is look for members who have been around a good while, have an established track record of being often present in the forum, are consistently helpful to their fellow members, and with a clean record for their personal behavior and an unflappable, even temper.  Then we approach them and see if they're interested.  Some are, some aren't.

(Moving thread to Kerbal Network, since it's about the forum.)

Cool!
Cant believe that i have a chance (a small one) to be a moderator
